LanguageData.SomeFoodDesc: Food is not of an immediate concern.n Full bars worth of food in storage:{0}N Colonists/prisoners getting food: {1}N Days worth of food in storage:{2}
LanguageData.SomeFoodDescNew: Food is not of an immediate concern.{n}n Full bars worth of food in storage:{0}N Colonists/prisoners getting food: {1}N Amount of food eaten per day:{2}N 储存的食物的天数。{3}
LanguageData.LowFoodDescNew: Food is a concern.{n}n Full bars worth of food in storage:{0}N Colonists/prisoners getting food: {1}N Amount of food eaten per day:{2}/n 储存的食物的天数。{3}
LanguageData.FoodAlert_Ridiculous: \这是一个完全荒谬的食物数量。
LanguageData.SettingExplanation:
\Examples
DesperateOnly: fertilized eggs, ambrosia
RawBad: kibble, unfertilized eggs
RawTasty: milk, berries
MealAwful: nutrient paste meal
MealSimple: simple meal, pemmican
MealFine: fine meal, insect jelly
MealLavish: lavish meal
LanguageData.FA.updatetype.label: 更新频率
LanguageData.FA.typedynamic.label: 动态的
LanguageData.FA.typedynamic.description: 将根据食物的可用天数来更新食物状况。可用的食物天数越多，工具提示的更新频率就越低。这是为了提高大型殖民地的性能。
LanguageData.FA.typestatic.slider: 在游戏中每隔{0}小时更新一次
